required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dose Ranging Study - Macroflux PTH in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Dose Ranging Study of the Effects of Macroflux® PTH Compared With Macroflux® Placebo and FORTEO® in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis

brief_summary.textblock: A Multi-center study to determine effects of various doses of Macroflux PTH in women with osteoporosis

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the effect of 3 doses of Macroflux® human parathyroid hormone (1-34) (PTH) administered for 24 weeks on lumbar spine bone mineral density (BMD) compared to Macroflux® placebo.

secondary_outcome.measure: To determine the systemic and topical safety of 3 doses of Macroflux® PTH, self administered daily for 24 weeks in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis compared to Macroflux® placebo and FORTEO®;
To compare the pharmacokinetics of 3 doses of Macroflux® PTH to FORTEO®
To evaluate the effect of three doses of Macroflux® PTH on total hip, femoral neck and forearm BMD relative to placebo and FORTEO®

To determine the effect of 3 doses of Macroflux® PTH administered on serum procollagen 1 N-terminal propeptide (P1NP) and serum C-terminal cross-linking telopeptide of type 1 collagen (CTX)compared to Macroflux® placebo

intervention.description: Macroflux® patch applied to the abdomen for 30 minutes daily
FORTEO® injection administered subcutaneously (SC) either to the abdomen or thigh

responsible_party.name_title: Mostafa Elhamy, Associate Director, Clinical Operations
